mtc:Taxon.name: TestProcess.Measure.Current.AC

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Output
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Output Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: The process measures the AC Current sourced by a device without knowing the shape of the signal. Values can only be tested in RMS because the shape to the signal is unknown.

mtc:Taxon.name: TestProcess.Measure.Current.DC

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Output
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Output Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: The process measures the Direct Current sourced by a device.

mtc:Taxon.name: TestProcess.Measure.Voltage.AC

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Input
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Input Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: This process measures the AC RMS (Root-Mean-Square) voltage sourced by the UUT. Values can only be expressed in RMS because the shape of the signal is not known.

mtc:Taxon.name: TestProcess.Measure.Voltage.DC

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Input
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Input Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: This test process measures the DC (Direct Current) voltage sourced from the UUT.

mtc:Taxon.name: TestProcess.Measure.Volts.AC

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Input
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Input Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: This process measures the AC RMS (Root-Mean-Square) voltage sourced by the UUT. Values can only be expressed in RMS because the shape of the signal is not known.

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Output
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Output Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: The process measures the AC Current sourced by a device without knowing the shape of the signal. Values can only be tested in RMS because the shape to the signal is unknown.

mtc:Taxon.name: TestProcess.Measure.Current.DC

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Output
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Output Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: The process measures the Direct Current sourced by a device.

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Input
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Input Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: This process measures the AC RMS (Root-Mean-Square) voltage sourced by the UUT. Values can only be expressed in RMS because the shape of the signal is not known.

mtc:Taxon.name: TestProcess.Measure.Voltage.DC

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Input
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Input Name of the UUT Connecting Point

mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: This test process measures the DC (Direct Current) voltage sourced from the UUT.
